revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 74:;Longinus, son of Aponis (Ankialitis);;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 5) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 7 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 0.5, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 4 obols 4.5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 16 obol 1;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, son of Sarapion (the daughter of Petheus);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 23) eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2. in total drachmas 11 obl 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obols 3, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 5.5;;Petheus, son of Hatres (Pasion, son of Konsenetis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 6 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 5 chalki 2, naubion obols 3.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 28 obols 27) eparourion drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 14 obol 0.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 15 obols 3.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1, in total drachmas 16 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;Thatres, son of Phanomgeus (the daughter of Hatres, weaver);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3;;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 21)eparourion drachma 1 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4 obols 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5 obol 1 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obol 1.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2;;Ammonous, fatherless (Ptolemaios, son of Amaalti);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obols 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 5, in total drachmas 13 obols 2;;and to Onnophris, son of Akousilaos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191);;(in left margin: drachmas 44 obols 5) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3 chalki 2, naubion obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;in total for the day drachmas 208 obols 10;;(Pauni) 7 likewise:;Melanas, son of Harpokration, cultivator in the 71st cleruchy;;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 15) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of oil drachma 1 obol 1, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obols 5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 5, in total drachmas 13 obols 2; ;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, obols 28;;Eutyches, slave of Sarapias, drachmas 8;;Kastor the younger, son of Achillas, grandson of Kastor, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 16;;in total for the day drachmas 52 obols 14.;(Pauni) 8 likewise:;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambas, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 8.;(Pauni) 9 likewise:;Ischyras, son of Hatres (living in the house of Ptolemaios, son of Psatemis;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 8)eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obols 2.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- BL III, 113 (on l. 2970). Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
